Name: digital_financial_literacy
Title: Enhancing Digital Financial Literacy for Inclusive Banking in Japan
Description: Investigate the current levels of digital financial literacy among various demographics in Japan, especially the aging population. Use surveys and interviews to gather data on user experiences and literacy levels. Assess the effectiveness of existing educational programs and propose new strategies in partnership with banks and educational institutions to improve digital literacy. The aim is to ensure all citizens can access and benefit from digital banking services, reducing financial exclusion.
